about_the_game:
12 original music tracks by composer Mario Luengo, commissioned for Tomboys Need Love Too.
The tracks are all high quality WAV files.

Track list:
01 Chilling At Home.wav
02 Back to School.wav
03 Quiet Night.wav
04 Sexy Time.wav
05 Foreboding.wav
06 Danger.wav
07 Remorse.wav
08 Uplifting.wav
09 On The Street.wav
10 Daily Trek.wav
11 Teaser Theme.wav
12 Theme song.wav
